name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - dosulepin
title: Dosulepin cost per 1000 patients
openc_numerator_name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - dosulepin
why_it_matters: Dosulepin (formerly known as dothiepin) is an antidepressant.
NICE recommends that it is not used for new patients due to safety concerns.
There are many newer anti-depressants available.
